ygData.subject: Re: BardSpeed (tm)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ve killed enough shadowed men to have them aggro me whenever I pass by. In Nektulos a few days ago, I happened upon the camp on my way to East Commons.
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 4 Jan 2000, Robin Wise 3 wrote:

> 36 with MM drums. So now I am wondering if there is anything in the world
> faster than me other than Shadowed Men and higher-level bards...

I've killed enough shadowed men to have them aggro me whenever I pass by.
In Nektulos a few days ago, I happened upon the camp on my way to East
Commons. They started their usual beat-up-the-bard routine as I floored
it (so to speak) up the valley wall. On the other side, however, I
managed to gain enough ground on the declining slope to not get hit again
all the way to the zone.

Moral: Hills (and safe fall) are good.

Athren Notechaser
42 and counting, Cazic-Thule
